void trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap ( InstanceNode *  instanceNode,
Transform  parentWTO,
QVector< QPair< TShapeKit *, Transform > > *  surfacesList 
) [inline]

Compute a map with the InstanceNodes of sub-tree with top node instanceNode.

The map stores for each InstanceNode its BBox and its transform in global coordinates.

double  wPhoton,
TPhotonMap *  photonMap

Saves to filename file the photonMap all information.

The file first data is the wPhoton. The power per photon in W/m2.
